title: What is 'ultimate bravery"
body:
Is it some kind of meme? I've had two games lately where people build like trolls and spam 'ultimate bravery' in chat.
This has to be bannable as it's essentially intentionally behaving in a retarded fashion. Right?

replies.body: its fun if you have friends and ii dont think you should get banned for doing it in a game of blind pick.

> [{quoted}](name=SheapMag11,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Wy3eYgLt,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-12T16:13:52.107+0000)
>
> its fun if you have friends and ii dont think you should get banned for doing it in a game of blind pick.

blind pick is casual and trolly to begin with.

id say it should still be allowed there.

like if youre playing blind pick, youre not playing serious from the start, since your matchups are essentially entirely random to the point where you even might end up in a mirror match. the skill level of people who are matched with and against you is also entirely random.

id say having fun with random shit is more important than winning in that mode.

from casual to serious its

- aram/normal blind/rotating gamemodes
- normal draft
- ranked solo/duo

if you want to do shit like ap assassin jungle bard, mid lane ap ashe, or ultimate bravery, then blind pick is the way to go.

if you want to play somewhat serious, but not stress about winning or losing too much, just que up for normal draft.
whens the last time they updated the items?

It's meant for only custom games, though it could be a fun game mode idea in the rotating game modes. Summoner's rift, they give you a random champion and then once you get into the game the shop only has a few items and you have to build only those items lol. I'd play a game mode like that, would be more fun then most of the modes on the rotating game mode and it would also force people to play different champions/builds so the game won't have the same champions in every game like every other mode.

It's a custom game type where people go to the site and it selects for them a random champion they own, random summoner spells, and a random item build which much be built in that order. If you are not playing that custom game and they are doing that they are trolling and should be reported.
It was fun for a while, but I havent seen it in ages
